group_1.narration: It's been a while since the last battle, @and my wounds have been healing, slowly but steadily.
Even now, I'm always thinking about defeating Yuna. @I don't like the idea of Torayamachi ruling all of Futatsugi.
If you still haven't decided between Torayamachi or @Ryuugasaki, I have one last thing to tell you, @if you'll come listen.
I'm not trying to gather you all in one place @so I can kill you. I mean, I still haven't @recovered enough to take you guys on, @so don't worry about that.

group_1.textLeft: Looks like Juri sent that message to everyone...

group_1.textRight: I'll bet Torayamachi has approached us all.
What are you guys going to do, though...?

group_1.textLeft: Let's not talk about it out in the open. @It's a sensitive subject, after all.
We're all here because we're either willin' @to follow Juri, or we're on the fence.
Let's go.

group_1.textCenter: This is way more than I expected... @Oh man...

group_1.textRight: You're the one that called us over...

group_1.textCenter: Well, yeah, but I thought you guys had given up @on me.

group_1.textLeft: If we had, we wouldn't be here now.
You said it in your message, didn't you?
That if we hadn't picked a side yet, @you had one last thing to tell us.

group_1.textCenter: So, what do you have to say to us?
Are you gonna tell us to stop being stubborn and @just go join Torayamachi?

group_1.textLeft: You were right.

group_1.textRight: What are you two talking about?

group_1.textLeft: Nevermind. What I have to say is real simple.
Let's come together as Ryuugasaki again and wreck Torayamachi.

group_1.textRight: I can't believe you're suggesting that after they just destroyed us.

group_1.textLeft: Despite all that, you still can't decide who to work @with, which is why you're here now, right?
Torayamachi or Ryuugasaki...
Honestly, since Yuna's got her guard down now, @it's the perfect time to strike.
Yeah, we can turn the tables on 'em.
Juri the Great can drag Yuna back out in front @of her...
And it'll give you guys a chance to thin out @the competition, too.

group_1.textRight: Torayamachi's proven that Witches have been returning.
We investigated with them and found out that there @are as many Witches now as there were before,
so I think we could work together under the right conditions.

group_1.textLeft: What caused the Witches to disappear in the first @place, though?
That's a load of bullshit.
What if they stop showing up again? @Are we gonna go back to killing each other?

group_1.textRight: ...Maybe we can live in peace until then.

group_1.textLeft: And what happens after that? @You might end up on the chopping block.
It's now or never. We've gotta do it.
We can reverse the situation with as little bloodshed @as possible.

group_1.textCenter: We have a meeting planned with Yuna to discuss @the terms of our cooperation, so...
I ain't thrilled about doin' it this way...
But if it lets me fight Yuna again, I don't have a @choice.

group_1.narration: "You can kill the other girls, but leave Yuna alive."

group_1.textLeft: Alright, Juri the Great's gonna let her wounds heal @and wait for the right time.

group_1.textRight: There's a chance Ao might show up at the meeting @as well, isn't there...?

group_1.textLeft: You're the only one who can stop that from @happenin'.
You've gotta tell her what you wanna tell her.
